content.text: Match ends, Valencia 4, Granada CF 0.

Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) is shown the yellow card for excessive celebration.
Goal!  Valencia 3, Granada CF 0. Sofiane Feghouli (Valencia) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Álvaro Negredo following a fast break.
